data.title: Zo√´ Salmon welcomes first child with husband Will Corrie
data.meta_description: TV presenter Zo√´ Salmon has shared a black and white snap on social media this morning, breaking the news that she has given birth to her first child.
data.text:
Cam Merchant and Jules Robinson

MAFS Australia couple Cam Merchant and Jules Robinson announced in February 2024 that they are expecting their second child together! The couple welcomed their son Ollie in 2020. Cam and Jules' second baby is due in July 2024.

Lea Michele and Zandy Reich

Glee actress Lea Michele and her husband Zandy Reich announced in March they are expecting their second child together. Lea posted the most stunning photo of her bump to social media, writing: 'Mommy, Daddy and Ever are overjoyed. üíõ'. (sic)

Adwoa Aboah and Daniel Wheatley

Adwoa Aboah has announced she is expecting a child with her partner Daniel Wheatley. The Top Boy actress took to social media to share some photos of her baby bump before appearing on the red carpet at the Met Gala.

Georgia Kousoulou and Tommy Mallett

Reality stars Georgia Kousoulou and Tommy Mallett announced in May they were expecting their second child together. Following a tragic miscarriage last year, Georgia and Tommy confirmed on social media they are expecting a rainbow baby in December.

Jorgie Porter and Ollie Piotrowski

Hollyoaks actress Jorgie Porter and her fianc√© Ollie Piotrowski announced at the end of May that they are expecting their second child together! Sharing a cute video including a baby scan, Jorgie told fans on Instagram: 'We've been keeping a little secret üëÄ'. The pair are already parents to their son Forest.

'.

Daisy Wood-Davis and Luke Jerdy

Former Hollyoaks stars Daisy Wood-Davis and Luke Jerdy announced in June they are expecting their second child together! The pair, who got married in 2022, are already parents to Asa, who they welcomed in 2021.

Joanne Froggatt

Actress Joanne Froggatt, known for roles in the likes of Downtown Abbey, Liar and Breathtaking, announced in June she's expecting her first child! The 43-year-old proudly showed off her bump as she walked the red carpet at the Into Film Awards in London.

Jake and Sophie Quickenden

Reality TV star Jake Quickenden and his wife Sophie announced they are expecting their second child together in July. Taking to Instagram to share their lovely news, Jake wrote: 'WE HAVE NEWS‚Ä¶. soon to be five. We can finally let you know after a long time trying we are gonna bring another bundle of joy into the world üåç We are super excited. Can't wait to live off 2 hours sleep again üòÇ. Have a lovely Sunday ‚ù§Ô∏è'.

The couple, who got married in 2022, are already parents to three-year-old so Leo. as well as Sophie's son Freddie from a previous relationship.

Margot Robbie and Tom Ackerley

Barbie star Margot Robbie and her husband Tom Ackerley are reportedly expecting their first child together. Multiple sources seemingly confirmed the news to PEOPLE, but Margot and Tom are yet to publicly comment. Days after the rumours, Margot appeared to show off her bump at Wimbledon.
